page.title: 12LOCAL DIALECT.
page.content:
Unfortunately the dialect is dying out among the younger people.Some of the older generation however were pleased to give these examples:
Wass amiss ? - What's the matter? Thus arf arder five _Its half past 5 Goo to th hoss pond _Go to the horse I warrant _ I bet pond Finchful _ Finchingfield Goo alon th brew _ walk along the edge Ood _ Wood of the field Th young varmit _ Naughty child Gid it a good rassel _ Give the fire a good poke Pickin up taters _ Picking up potatoes Taint sa likely _ not so likely Acount Ill het a goo _Expect Ill have to go It will be a pity if in years to come local dialect disappears altogether.
